title: Elderly Chinese woman prays to Garen

replies.body:
wow thats super xd

nice le meme 

hahahaha
All hail mighty garen,deity of the bush.

He somewhat resembles Guan Yu, a chinese god of war, and because the statues and images of them change, she could have perceived the "general with a big weapon" as a god of war pretty easily, either that or she fell over in a "pray to" position.

\>kotaku
